## Introduction

One of the best resources to learn about functionality afforded by `easystats`
package is to read the dedicated websites for each package. A lot of love and
work has gone into writing detailed function documentation and vignettes for
these websites and we will highly recommend you check them out.

But, we are certainly not the only ones talking about them, and below are some
other resources that might be helpful for you to learn about `easystats`
packages.

## YouTube videos
